title: Harry & Bip
overview: Two energetic young penguins who are all about the three 'F's... Fun, Fish and Friends! Harry and Bip live in the Antarctic, a vast icy expanse they can't wait to explore...They navigate their friendship and the world around them with physical humour, slap-stick comedy and a lot of heart. We'll join them as they try to build an ambitious extension to their igloo...
